alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; Annette Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Wrangell; City and Borough of Yakutat; City of Hyder; Eastern Chichagof Island; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Petersburg Borough; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 12:56PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...A Strong Storm Moves Through the Panhandle... A gale force low with a significant source of moisture is moving through the Gulf of Alaska. So far 1 to 3 inches of rain has fallen with another 1 to 2 inches is expected. The heaviest rains will continue through this evening. The heaviest precipitation looks to be focused along the northeast gulf coast and southern panhandle by late tonight. Small streams are expected to see rapid rises from the heavy rainfall amounts with some reaching bankfull. This front is also bringing windy conditions to Southeast communities. Sustained winds of 15 to 25 mph with periods of high gusts to 25 to 35 mph are expected to continue through this evening before they being to diminish late tonight.
